Others: Yamamoto allowed four runs in three innings, marking only the third time he failed to last four innings in 17 starts.
Mookie Betts hit his 19th home run of the season in walk-off fashion.
Shohei Ohtani hit another home run and collected two stolen bases, inching closer to the 60-60 club (53 HR, 55 SB).
The Dodgers are 14-5 when Betts hits a home run.
